attributes.action: To sign toll roads, now and in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are being tricked into going on toll roads without realising. A great example of such trickery is on the M6, near Cannock, where you must turn off the road to avoid the toll and continuing straight on will take you onto the toll road, which is quite expensive. I think toll roads should be clearly signed, as in France, where 'péage' is posted next to every destination which requires using the tolled route.
